thumb.title: Wruble Law LLC
thumb.description: Wruble Law LLC handles it all, from a misdemeanor to felony, theft crimes to sex crimes to drug crimes, to clearing a criminal record through expungement, which requires the help of a lawyer after probation is complete.Even when a conviction unfortunately occurs, Attorney Wruble strives to secure the most favorable probation terms, such as diversion for first-time offenders. Stan guides his clients through the probation process to keep them from violating it in Indianapolis, Marion County, Hamilton, Hendricks County, Boone County, and Johnson County.Wruble Law LLC1512 N. Delaware St. Suite 201, Indianapolis, IN 46202(317) 597-1846https://wrublelaw.com/
